title: Jordan River so Chilly and Cold
lyrics:
Jordan river so chilly and cold,
It chills my body but not my soul,
Jordan river so chilly and cold,
It chills my body but not my soul
And every time I feel the Spirit
Moving in me l want to pray,
And every time l feel the Spirit
Moving in me l want to pray.
